Title: Relates to prohibiting the unauthorized installation of certain security devices on residential buildings
Summary: Prohibits the installation of certain security devices used to control access to common areas of a residential building without the written permission of the manager or board of directors of such property.
LawCode: Add ยง390-d, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting the unauthorized installation of certain security devices on residential buildings
